definition: neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
exactly/in good order/whole/complete/entire/in order/orderly/to repair/to mend/to renovate/(coll.) to fix sb/to give sb a hard time/to mess with sb

sentences.english: America believes in the independence and territorial integrity of Iran.
sentences.chinese: 美国确信伊朗应当保持独立和领土完整。

sentences.english: The Anti-Secession Law was enacted to resolutely safeguard China's sovereignty and territorial integrity.
sentences.chinese: 制定反分裂国家法，坚决维护国家主权和领土完整。

sentences.english: The resolve of the Chinese Government to safeguard territorial integrity and maritime rights and interests is resolute.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府捍卫领土完整和海洋权益的决心是坚定的。

sentences.english: The Chinese Government will as always resolutely safeguard its sovereignty and territorial integrity.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府将一如既往，坚定捍卫本国主权和领土完整。

sentences.english: The alliance said the international community strongly reaffirms its su ort for the territorial integrity of Georgia.
sentences.chinese: 北约表示，国际社会强烈重申支持格鲁吉亚领土完整。

sentences.english: China will defend its territorial integrity from old thieves .
sentences.chinese: 中国将从这些惯偷手里维护自己的领土完整。

sentences.english: Espersen also reaffirmed Denmark's adherence to the one-China policy and respect for China's sovereignty and territorial integrity.
sentences.chinese: 丹方坚持一个中国政策，尊重中国主权和领土完整。

sentences.english: While China, making use of the conflicts between Japan and Soviet Union, strove for its independence and the territorial integrity.
sentences.chinese: 当然中国也要利用日苏矛盾维护本国独立及领土完整。

definition: Heping district of Shenyang city 瀋陽市|沈阳市, Liaoning/Hoping township in Taichung county 臺中縣|台中县[Tai2 zhong1 xian4], Taiwan
